recipes.title: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
recipes.ingredients: Pasta, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, zucchini, olive oil, garlic, parmesan cheese, basil
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic and vegetables in olive oil. Toss pasta with vegetables and top with parmesan cheese and basil.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Tacos
recipes.ingredients: Corn tortillas, black beans, corn, avocado, lettuce, salsa, lime, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Warm tortillas. Fill with black beans, corn, avocado, and lettuce. Top with salsa, lime juice, and cilantro.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, snap peas, carrots, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, tofu, sesame oil
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry tofu in sesame oil. Add garlic and ginger, then vegetables. Stir-fry with soy sauce until tender.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.ingredients: Kidney beans, black beans, bell peppers, tomatoes, onion, garlic, chili powder, cumin, oregano
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add bell peppers, tomatoes, beans, and spices. Simmer until flavors meld.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Pizza
recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, bell peppers, olives, spinach
recipes.instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Add cheese and vegetables. Bake until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, coconut milk, spinach, tomatoes, onion, garlic, ginger, curry powder, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add curry powder, tomatoes, chickpeas, and coconut milk. Simmer and add spinach.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Quesadillas
recipes.ingredients: Flour tortillas, black beans, corn, cheese, bell peppers, avocado, salsa
recipes.instructions: Fill tortillas with beans, corn, cheese, and bell peppers. Cook in a skillet until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Lasagna
recipes.ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, spinach, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic, basil
recipes.instructions: Layer noodles with ricotta, spinach, marinara sauce, and cheeses. Bake until bubbly and golden.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Burgers
recipes.ingredients: Black beans, bread crumbs, egg, garlic, onion, cumin, chili powder, hamburger buns, lettuce, tomato
recipes.instructions: Mash beans with spices, bread crumbs, and egg. Form patties and cook in a skillet. Serve on buns with lettuce and tomato.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Enchiladas
recipes.ingredients: Corn tortillas, black beans, corn, bell peppers, enchilada sauce, cheese, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Fill tortillas with beans, corn, and bell peppers. Roll up and place in a baking dish. Cover with enchilada sauce and cheese, then bake.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.ingredients: Chicken breast, fettuccine, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, garlic, butter, parsley
recipes.instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté garlic in butter, add cream and parmesan to make sauce. Cook chicken and toss with pasta and sauce.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, corn tortillas, lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Warm tortillas. Fill with beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, butter, lemon, white wine, parsley, linguine
recipes.instructions: Cook linguine. Sauté garlic in butter, add shrimp and cook until pink. Add lemon juice and white wine, then toss with pasta.

recipes.title: BBQ Ribs
recipes.ingredients: Pork ribs, BBQ sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Season ribs with spices. Bake or grill until tender. Brush with BBQ sauce and cook until caramelized.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken breast, curry powder, coconut milk, tomatoes, onion, garlic, ginger, cilantro
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.ingredients: Beef strips, mushrooms, onion, garlic, sour cream, beef broth, egg noodles
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and set aside. Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms. Add broth and sour cream, then return beef to pan. Serve over noodles.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.ingredients: Chicken breast, bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil
recipes.instructions: Bread chicken with crumbs and parmesan. Bake until golden. Top with marinara and mozzarella, then bake until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Lamb Kebabs
recipes.ingredients: Lamb, bell peppers, onion, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, rosemary
recipes.instructions: Marinate lamb with garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and rosemary. Skewer with vegetables and grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.ingredients: White fish, corn tortillas, cabbage, lime, cilantro, avocado, sour cream
recipes.instructions: Cook fish and flake. Warm tortillas. Fill with fish, cabbage, avocado, and cilantro. Top with lime juice and sour cream.

recipes.title: Pork Chops
recipes.ingredients: Pork chops, garlic, rosemary, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: Season pork chops with garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Sear in olive oil until cooked through.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Bake at 350°F until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.ingredients: Apples, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, butter, pie crust
recipes.instructions: Mix sliced apples with sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Place in pie crust, dot with butter, cover with top crust. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.ingredients: Cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, graham cracker crust
recipes.instructions: Beat cream cheese with sugar and vanilla. Add eggs one at a time. Pour into crust and bake until set.

recipes.title: Brownies
recipes.ingredients: Butter, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, flour, vanilla extract, baking powder
recipes.instructions: Melt butter and mix with sugar and cocoa. Add eggs and vanilla, then flour and baking powder. Bake until set.

recipes.title: Lemon Bars
recipes.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, eggs, lemon juice, lemon zest, baking powder
recipes.instructions: Make crust with flour, sugar, and butter. Bake, then top with lemon mixture and bake again until set.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.ingredients: Bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, butter, baking soda, vanilla extract, salt
recipes.instructions: Mash bananas and mix with melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla. Add flour, baking soda, and salt. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.title: Peach Cobbler
recipes.ingredients: Peaches, sugar, flour, baking powder, milk, butter
recipes.instructions: Mix peaches with sugar. Make batter with flour, baking powder, milk, and melted butter. Pour batter into dish, top with peaches, bake until golden.

recipes.title: Pecan Pie
recipes.ingredients: Pecans, corn syrup, sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, pie crust
recipes.instructions: Mix pecans with corn syrup, sugar, eggs, butter, and vanilla. Pour into crust and bake until set.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.ingredients: Mascarpone cheese, sugar, eggs, espresso, ladyfingers, cocoa powder
recipes.instructions: Mix mascarpone with sugar and eggs. Dip ladyfingers in espresso, layer with mascarpone mixture. Dust with cocoa and chill.

recipes.title: Carrot Cake
recipes.ingredients: Carrots, flour, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, baking soda, cinnamon, cream cheese
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients with grated carrots. Add eggs and oil. Bake until set. Frost with cream cheese frosting.

recipes.title: Hard Boiled Egg
recipes.ingredients:
Egg
Water
recipes.instructions:
1.Boil Hot water
2. Once boiling, add egg
3. Set timer to 7 minutes
4. Remove and place in cold water for 2 minutes
5. Remove and peel egg shells
6. Enjoy!
